https://tmrev.io/movie/922741-Celluloid Sounds 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null An intimate synthesis of sound and picture is created in Celluloid Sounds, a 16mm hand-processed film instillation. Crackles and pops carved onto hand-processed images float throughout the mysterious pseudo-multiplex, repetitiously mocking the environment and industry that is destined to abandon its beautiful image making creation... Celluloid Sounds
